title: "Longer Chip Lifecycles Increase Security Threat"
excerpt: "The longer chips and electronic systems remain in use, the more they will need to be refreshed with software and firmware updates. That creates a whole new level of security risks, ranging from over-the-air intercepts to compromised supply chains."
